text:
Hi everyone!

We are trying to make the meeting 1on1 calendar be on brand, like changing colors and the icon in print screen attached. Anyone has any ideas if this is even possible? The KB for meetings does not mention any styling article

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/sales-tools/topics?hubs_content=knowledge.HubSpot.com/sales-tools&hubs_content-cta=meetings#meetings>
Managed to change colors from the branding section, now the only question is about that icon.
